Title: Prohibits the operation of a bicycle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs
Summary: Prohibits the operation of a bicycle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs; applies upon public highways, private roads open to motor vehicle traffic, any other parking lot, and sidewalks.
LawCode: Amd ยง1242-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the operation of a bicycle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs
